text:
Midtrans | Jakarta or Bali, Indonesia | Onsite, Full-Time, Visa | Senior Software Engineer

Midtrans is a leading payment gateway in Indonesia. Domestic e-commerce market growing rapidly over last several years, and we are confidently catching this wave, making hard things easy and watering online shops to grow. Also making our competitors to copy our products. With a constant growth we are constantly looking for engineers
